snippet.title: Delta Force | Official "Genesis" Season Trailer
snippet.description:
The Delta Force PC Open Beta kicks off on Dec 5 with the launch of "Genesis" — our first season of regular updates packed with new content. Join all-new Operator Zoya Pomkenchova, also known as "Toxik", as she confronts the legacy of her past life and goes face-to-face with the newest Operations boss: Dr. R!

The Delta Force PC Global Open Beta launches for free on December 5, 2024, with no more downtime, no progress resets, no seasonal wipes, and absolutely no pay-to-win: https://playdeltaforce.com

Delta Force is a free-to-play first-person tactical shooter for PC, consoles, and mobile. As the latest installment of the classic series that has defined the genre for 25 years, Delta Force is back with an upgraded arsenal of weaponry, jaw-dropping environments, and a truly dynamic world.

_____________________________________________

Learn more about the game: https://playdeltaforce.com
Join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/deltaforcegame
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/deltaforcegame
Follow us on X: https://twitter.com/DeltaForce_Game
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deltaforcegameglobal

#DeltaForceOpenBeta #DeltaForceGame #DeltaForcePC #DeltaForce
